html: The story of India’s first Gold medal victory for the first time in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Happy to share, #Gold is the first ever Bollywood movie to release in the Kingdom Of Saudi Arabia, in cinemas from today! @excelmovies @ZeeStudiosInt
text:
The story of India’s first Gold medal victory for the first time in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Happy to share, #Gold is the first ever Bollywood movie to release in the Kingdom Of Saudi Arabia, in cinemas from today! 

@excelmovies @ZeeStudiosInt

html: Today being the birth anniversary of one of India’s greatest sportsman, #MajorDhyanChand is also marked as #NationalSportsDay. The best tribute would be to not just celebrate it for a day but make sports a way of life.

html: Met the living hockey legend Mr. @BalbirSenior who was part of the winning team that brought home the first prestigious Gold for India back in 1948 along with @sudhirchaudhary. Such an inspiration of a man with even more inspiring stories.pic.twitter.com/3O8rSFt97I

html: A major chunk of #Gold was shot in Bradford. Pleased to see @bfdcityoffilm extending their support in honour of India's first Gold medal and turning their city Gold yesterday. I had a great time filming there, thank you for making it a wonderful experience. #BradfordTurnsGoldpic.twitter.com/p5XMI0SJIf
text: A major chunk of #Gold was shot in Bradford. Pleased to see @bfdcityoffilm extending their support in honour of India's first Gold medal and turning their city Gold yesterday.
